src:
Wapres Ma'ruf Amin Tinjau Mako Paspampres
01 Nov 2019, 11:13 by Retno M



Wapres Ma'ruf Amin Tinjau Mako Paspampres



Wapres Ma'ruf Amin Tinjau Mako Paspampres



Wapres Ma'ruf Amin Tinjau Mako Paspampres


KBRN, Jakarta : Wakil Presiden (Wapres) K.H Ma'ruf Amin pagi ini meninjau Markas Komando (Mako) Pasukan Pengamanan Presiden (Paspampres) di Jalan Tanah Abang II No.6 Jakarta Pusat, Jum'at (1/11/2019).Peninjauan ini merupakan kali pertama yg dilakukan oleh Wapres K.H Ma'ruf Amin ke Mako Paspampres sejak dirinya dilantik sebagai Wakil Presiden.Wapres mengenakan pakaian PSL didampingi Ibu Hj. Wury Ma'ruf Amin tiba di Mako Paspampres pukul 07.45 WIB langsung disambut oleh Komandan dan Wakil Komandan Paspampres lalu menerima jajar kehormatan dan foto bersama.Pada peninjauan ini Wapres K.H Ma'ruf Amin disuguhkan atraksi kepiawaian Paspampres dalam melakukan pengamanan Kepresidenan.Atraksi kepiawaian Paspampres ini memberikan  pesan yang tersirat bahwa jangan pernah meragukan Paspampres sebagai pasukan yang solid, profesional, dan siap menjadi perisai hidup Presiden dan Wakil Presiden. Kesetiaan dan kewaspadaan Paspampres ini sangat dijunjung tinggi, sebagaimana motto Paspampres "Setia Waspada" yang tercantum dalam pita warna kuning emas dalam logo Paspampres. Setia Waspada ini memiliki makna bahwa prajurit Paspampres adalah prajurit yang senantiasa setia kepada tugasnya, setia pada Pancasila dan Sapta Marga, serta setia kepada bangsa dan negara RI dengan memelihara tingkat kewaspadaan yang tinggi.Dalam kesempatan ini Wapres diperkenalkan tentang kesiapsiagaan Paspampres oleh Komandan Paspampres Mayor Jenderal TNI Maruli Simanjuntak.Diakhir acara, Wapres K.H Ma'ruf Amin menorehkan tulisannya di atas kanvas tentang kesan dan pesannya kepada Paspampres."NKRI (Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia) adalah warisan dan amanat para pendiri bangsa dan Paspampres sesuai dengan mottonya setia dan waspada harus mengawal dan menjaga NKRI dan para pemimpinnya," tulis Wapres.Tampak hadir bersama Wakil Presiden RI, Kepala Staf Umum TNI -Letnan Jenderal TNI Joni Supriyanto, Inspektorat Jenderal TNI -Letnan Jenderal TNI Muhammad Herindra,   Komandan Paspampres -Mayor Jenderal TNI Maruli Simanjuntak, dan Wakil Komandan Paspampres Marsekal Pertama TNI Deny Muis.Turut mendampingi Wapres dalam acara tersebut Deputi Bidang Administrasi Guntur Iman Nefianto dan Masduki Baidlowi. (AS/RN, KIP-Setwapres).
text:
Vice President Ma'ruf Amin Reviews the Paspampres Mako
Nov 01 2019, 11:13 by Retno M



Vice President Ma'ruf Amin Reviews the Paspampres Mako



Vice President Ma'ruf Amin Reviews the Paspampres Mako



Vice President Ma'ruf Amin Reviews the Paspampres Mako


KBRN, Jakarta: Vice President (Vice President) KH Ma'ruf Amin this morning reviewed the Command Headquarters (Mako) of the Presidential Security Force (Paspampres) on Jalan Tanah Abang II No.6, Central Jakarta, Friday (1/11/2019). This review was the first time conducted by the Vice President KH Ma'ruf Amin to Mako Paspampres since he was appointed as Vice President. The Vice President was wearing PSL attire accompanied by Mrs. Hj. Wury Ma'ruf Amin arrived at Mako Paspampres at 07.45 West Indonesia Time and was immediately greeted by the Commander and Deputy Commander of the Paspampres and received a line of honors and a group photo. At this review Vice President KH Ma'ruf Amin was presented with the attraction of Paspampres' expertise in securing the Presidential Presidency. giving an implied message that don't ever doubt Paspampres as a solid, professional force and ready to be the shield of life for the President and Vice President. The loyalty and vigilance of the Paspampres are highly valued, as the motto of Paspampres "Setia Waspada" is stated in the golden yellow ribbon in the Paspampres logo. This faithful faithful means that Paspampres soldiers are soldiers who are always loyal to their duties, loyal to Pancasila and Sapta Marga, and loyal to the nation and country of Indonesia by maintaining a high level of vigilance. On this occasion the Vice President was introduced about Paspampres preparedness by Paspampres Commander Major General TNI Maruli Simanjuntak. At the end of the event, the Vice President KH Ma'ruf Amin carved his writing on canvas about his impressions and messages to Paspampres. "NKRI (Republic of Indonesia Unity) is the legacy and mandate of the founders of the nation and Paspampres in accordance with its motto of being loyal and alert to guarding Paspampres." and safeguarding the Republic of Indonesia and its leaders, "wrote the Vice President. They were present along with the Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia, TNI General Staff Chief Lieutenant General Joni Supriyanto, Inspector General of the TNI - Lieutenant General of the Republic of Indonesia Muhammad Herindra, Commander of the Paspampres -Mayor General of the TNI Maruli Simanjuntak, and Deputy of the TNI Commander of the First Paspampres Marshal Deny Mui According to accompanying the Vice President at the event the Deputy for the Administration of Thunder Iman Nefianto and Masduki Baidlowi. (US / RN, KIP-Setwapres).
